assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_For_DeNovo_Initial_Initiation_Criteria_Q15
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: a) Unexplained thrombocytopenia (platelets <150 x 10^9 /L or a significant reduction from baseline) AND the presence of hemolysis (schistocytes AND either increased LDH or low haptoglobin)
